dict.acceptation: 满的，装满的；完全的，完整的；丰富的；详尽的；
极其，十分；充分地，完全地；整整；直接地；
充分，完全；全部；完整；极盛时；
把衣服缝得宽大；把裙子缝出皱褶；[印]蒸洗，漂洗；

sent.orig: Full-length cDNA pool is the most important step in construction of cDNA library.
sent.trans: 而全长cDNA池(full-length cDNA pool)则是cDNA文库构建的最重要环节。

sent.orig: They run around full of garbage, full of frustration, full of anger and full of disappointment.
sent.trans: 他们带着许多的垃圾、许多的怨气、许多的愤怒、许多的失望到处乱跑乱窜。

sent.orig: Full development includes the full development of personal ability and the full development of social relations.
sent.trans: “全面发展”包括个人能力的全面发展和个人社会关系的全面发展。

sent.orig: To achieve full broadband coverage of villages and the new rural electrification counties (cities) Full coverage.
sent.trans: 实现自然村宽带全覆盖和新农村电气化县（市）全覆盖。

sent.orig: High school full-time teacher qualifications rate of 94%, senior teachers, accounting for 45% of full-time teachers.
sent.trans: 高中专任教师学历达标率为94%，高级教师占专任教师的45%。
